Contents Presentation
The 'Theory and harmony' eBook is not yet finished and, currently, it is just a collection of lessons on music theory.
My main objective is not to write about music theory (there are many good books on this that you can use) but to spend my time in writing software. But some texts are necesary, I don't have much time for writing texts and it takes a lot of time to prepare an eBbook. Therefore, I have decided to publish the lessons as soon as I write them, instead of waiting until the whole book is finished.
